item.title: John add a quote by Tom Stoppard
item.description: "There must have been a moment, at the beginning, were we could have said -- no. But somehow we missed it. " -- Tom Stoppard

item.title: John add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Always there comes an hour when one is weary of one's work and devotion to duty, and all one craves for is a loved face, the warmth and wonder of a loving heart." -- Albert Camus

item.title: John add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "I think we are well advised to keep on nodding terms with the people we used to be, whether we find them attractive company or not. Otherwise they turn up unannounced and surprise us, come hammering on the mind's door at 4 a.m. of a bad night and demand to know who deserted them, who betrayed them, who is going to make amends." -- Joan Didion
